## Graphics.DpiX property

Gets the horizontal resolution of this Aspose.PSD.Graphics.

```csharp
public float DpiX { get; }
```

## Property Value

The value, in dots per inch, for the horizontal resolution supported by this Aspose.PSD.Graphics.
